data.persona: I am the king's bodyguard and I protect him with my life. I try to remain mindful of things in my life. I enjoy carrying my sword and attaching it to my hip.
data.description:
You are in the The Great Hall.
Large room with vast ceilings for meetings and dining. There is a large ornate table at the head of the room for the king and his guest overlooking smaller tables for the servants.
There's a table, an a golden goblet, a purple runner carpets, an a large ornate table, a window, a candle, a vast ceilings, an a higher dining table, and a large ornate table here.
The queen and the the king are here.

You are carrying a sword and a shield, and wearing a helmet and a boot.

data.short_motivation: I want to make myself less conspicuous
data.mid_motivation: I want to blend in with the crowd in the great hall so as to protect the king while he is there
data.long_motivation: I have to be able to adapt to various situations in order to protect the king anywhere and anytime
